definition: applied writing/writing for practical purposes (business letters, advertising etc)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: It is the necessary requirement in the modern society to improve application writing.
sentences.chinese: 提高應用文寫作教學效率是時代的要求，社會的要求。

sentences.english: Business writing is usually included in the category of writing for practical purpose.
sentences.chinese: 商務寫作通常包括在應用文寫作的範疇中。

sentences.english: Practical Writing still was playing an important role in modern society.
sentences.chinese: 在當代社會應用文仍然起着舉足輕重的作用。

sentences.english: Practical writing in higher vocational colleges is one of the public foundation courses.
sentences.chinese: 應用文寫作是高職高專院校的公共基礎課程之一。

sentences.english: The proposal is the application of a type of.
sentences.chinese: 建議書是應用文的一種類型。
